name: Fires of Riots
description:
** en **

Are you tired of being deprived of your freedom? So burn everything! We want chaos in the city ...

But by burning everything, you will attract the police!

** fr **

Vous en avez marre qu'on vous prive de liberté ? Alors cramez tout ! On veut du chaos dans la ville...

Mais en brûlant tout, vous allez attirer la police !

- Controls -

Keyboard : 

- WASD or ZQSD or Arrow keys = move

- F = fullscreen

- Enter = Start / Back Menu

Gamepad :

- Joystick or D-pad = move

- Select = fullscreen

- Start = Start / Back Menu

- Credits - 

 Game : Cyriaque
